trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Silverdale
There were no other sightings in Silverdale on or around July 30th 2013
Summary: was star gazing with family and members pointed out a bright white flash that was heading north it was huge like a headlight flash than turned a different direction and was gone
divs: Sighting Detailsduring a family get together we all were star gazing out on the lawn and just talking among ourselves when my uncle pointed out a huge bright light looked like car's high beams got flashed and it started out small and dim than that's when we all noticed how bright the ball of light got and it lasted about 10 seconds or so than it zig-zaged and suddenly the huge ball of light just vanished and faded out. after a few moments we all looked at each other in amusement and wondered if we were crazy or if we had mistaken it for another satellite we tried to focus on it after it faded out but there was no sight of it after that we witnessed several balls of light but this time they just blinked in and out and were gone in an instant not like the first time we had seen the very first one.
